entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
